library(mlbench)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(caTools)
data(BostonHousing)

fit.1 = lm(medv ~ ., data = BostonHousing)
fit.2 = lm(medv ~ zn + nox + rm + dis + rad + ptratio + b + lstat, data = BostonHousing)
fit.3 = lm(medv ~ . -indus - age, data = BostonHousing)

#fit.3 looks best in this linear model
summary(fit.3)

ggplot(aes(x = medv, y = fit.3$fitted.values), data = BostonHousing) + geom_point() + coord_equal(ylim = c(0, 50), xlim = c(0, 50)) + geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0, color="red") + xlab( "Median Home Value") + ylab("Estimated Value") + theme(plot.background = element_blank())
